name: Sparky
desc: Our protagonist! Need I say more?
quote: What's this? Cake? Eat! What's this? Donut? Eat! What's this? More food? Eat! Hey, you took the last pancake! I'M GOING TO KILL YOU!
about:
Sparky is a cheerful girl who once stood for something. She hides her trauma behind bright smiles and is almost uncapable of taking anything seriously. Usually she looks happy to other people, but she can turn aggressive at the drop of a pin. She is currently the bodyguard of [Animus](../animus/).

Thanks to [Ribbon](/characters/ribbon/) and [her mom](/characters/amber/), she is an excellent chef.

She's sort of a control freak, especially to the ones she love and fear losing. She also used to harbor naive but beautiful dreams about truth and justice, despite constantly handing out very questionable judgements she isn't supposed to give just because she has power to do so, and always viewing her own understanding as the objective truth. She died in the realization that she grew into exactly the person her younger self used to hate.
trivia:
- She twiddles her whisker-like hair when lying.
- Tofu is her favorite food. All kinds of them.
- She loves spicy food.
- She loves food.
- If she had a lusus, it would be a jackalope.
- Her motifs include jackalopes, bunnies, cats, and dancing lions.
    - This has nothing to do with the character [Jackalope](/characters/jackalope/).
- Theme song: [你哪个省的？](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1GDtvzVE8F/?share_source=copy_web&vd_source=e53ed4d7bb88e905821b63d23aa3aa43) (Parody of 
[裏表ラバーズ](https://youtu.be/b_cuMcDWwsI?si=s3Ka2daE4kp6abNe))
- If she were ever to have a *dedicated* theme song, it would be titled *Sugar High*.
note:
- The strand of hair on her left cheek is longer, touching on her chin, while the strand on her right cheek is shorter.
- The highlights on her hair goes down, up, and then down.
- Her pupils point towards the middle! Unless she's looking at somewhere in particular.
- Any interaction with Nightsun (romantic or otherwise) *must* be drawn in her adult design; so are bodyguarding activities (with or without Animus)!

name: Amber
desc: Hardworking girl who would be cheerful if she had the time to smile.
about: Amber has no idea how she came across Peacock; it was like magic. (Peacock was looking for her.) Now she finally has a stable life for herself and her daughter(s). However, after being turned by the shady organization fighting against Starcorp and Bauhinia (that I haven't named yet), she used her proximity to Peacock to find a lot of evidence for Starcorp's numerous crimes. Despite Peacock's pleas, she was assassinated by Starcorp.

name: Peacock
desc: Creepy old boy who knows everything and more.

attr.Marital status:
Widowed
(Previously widowed by Rainbow, divorced Reindeer, and widowed by Amber)

about:
Peacock is [Hyrax](/characters/hyrax/)'s old friend and personal attorney.

~~He is also [Sparky](/characters/sparky/)'s reincarnation.~~

{% image 'gallery/' 'peacock exploding butt.png' 200 "Willow exploding Peacock's butt" 'right' %}

He is practical and rational, and often appears quite emotionless. Around his kids, he constantly looks like he's about to kill himself.

His job, as he described it, is "professional butt-wiper." He covers up Starcorp's illegal activities, either by framing them as legal, or making sure no one has enough evidence to implicate them. Big things don't pop up that often though, so most of his time is spent union-busting and shutting people up about general employee mistreatment.
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a peacock.
note: The highlight on his hair goes up, down, and then up.

name: Willow
about: Ah, the cute little spoiled kid.

name: Ribbon
about:
Ribbon is a bakery owner in Coastline. Everybody likes her.

Her bakery is a front for a mafia operation though.

name: Qibli
quote: This pearl was not from an oyster. It was from a human. No, not man-made. From a human, the way ivory was from elephants.
about:
She is a *huge* pussy. Overthinks everything, tries to chicken out of more, always worrying about how things could go wrong.

She's really nerdy. She likes spy thrillers and computer programming, though she sucks at it. She also loves reading and drawing comics.

She was born with magic. But her magic was so weak that it didn't even show until she was three years old. Her parents took her to the hospital, the doctors called the Arch-Magician [Nebula](/characters/nebula/), and she told her parents to buy her a wand and taught her to store her magic in it. She hadn't left the wand's side since then.

She spent most of her childhood around [Sky](/characters/sky/).

She attended [Coastline Middle School](/world/bauhinia/cms/) because her mom worked there. Which is where she met [Sparky](/characters/sparky/).

~~She's also supposed to represent me by the way.~~
trivia:
- She always talks in past tense. If you see her talking in present tense, then I probably made a mistake.
- Her family has a cat named Sandstorm.
- Lightning is taken from one of my first OCs ever, a Warrior cat named Lightningtail. (That was before I read Dawn of the Clans.)
- If she were ever to have a theme song, it would be titled *Hotpot for One（单人火锅）*.
- If she had a lusus, it would be a husky.
- Her motifs include cats and dogs.
- The symbol on the hat is [Aquittarius](http://hs.hiveswap.com/ezodiac/truesign.php?TS=Aquittarius) from the Hiveswap Extended Zodiac.

name: Sky
about:
Sky is an adventurous boy who cannot stop moving.

He likes cardistry and is nearly always twiddling a desk of cards in his right hand.

His preferred weapon is a set of four cards made of steel with sharp edges, which act like throwing stars. The cards are aces of each suit.

He is really into stuff he considers cool, like photography, military, and science. He ended up looking nerdy.
trivia:
- He is left-handed.
- He has six countryball dolls on his desk, one for each country, that sqeak when you squish them.
note: - Left horn points down, right horn points up.

name: Firecrackers
desc: Big kind boy with no manners.
about:
Firecrackers likes cursing even more than Sparky does. It's better when he's directly speaking to you; he would only stick a lot of middle fingers at you. But when he's texting, you can expect a curse every sentence. He also likes telling jokes. When he's not telling jokes, he's reading jokes from joke books.

His dad runs a little grocery store, and he often manned it for them during his spare time. His mom was missing, and his dad won't tell him where she is.

He was drafted into the army during the Fantoni invasion despite his muteness, because he didn't have a disability certificate given out by a hospital that can prove it. He was killed during battle by one of the spells Qibli sold to Fanton.
trivia:
- Firecrackers is mute, if you haven't noticed.
- If he had a lusus, it would be a golden retriever.

name: Myriad
about:
Myriad has a mutation that gives her a pair of fairy wings. She's really insecure about it, worried that people would only try to use her for that, so she hides them tucked inside her backpack which she never takes off.

She's also a kleptomaniac. She holds herself back from stealing actually valuable stuff, but she loves pocketing pens and rulers and stuff. She also stole a lot of her parents' stuff, like a lipstick tube from her mom, which in turn got stolen by the imitator.
trivia: - 满族。

name: Alaska
about:
They're nearly always cheerful and happy-go-lucky looking. Don't be fooled by that. They will backstab you (or even front-stab you) every time they get the chance.

They're the imitation thief who stole Myriad's lipstick and Sky's poker cards in the pickpocket case. But Sparky framed Myriad for everything instead.
trivia: - When at school, he wears the non-gendered jacket uniform with nothing beneath. Two jackets if it's cold.

name: Tomato
desc: The guy who can solve all your problems but doesn't want to.
quote: I can fix anything... From a leaking pipe... to a shattered bone... to a broken heart...

name: Guillotine
desc: Who is this girl and why does she want us to call her Guillotine?
quote: I'm dead now! You can't kill me!
about: Guillotine is from Atlasia, but her parents came over to Bauhinia for work.

name: Tephra
desc: The boss of everything at once, but nothing in particular.
quote: Sit down everyone. The investigation is underway.
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a desert fox.

name: Jerboa
desc: Owner, bartender, and everything else of the tavern!
quote: Who ordered me to do it? It's — OW — I did it on my own! Nobody ordered me!!

attr.Occupation: Bartender, chemist, undertaker, and chemist again

about: Jerboa grew up in the Project Boomerang labs with his family. Later, his parents disappeared from the facility, and he was sent to Coastline and adopted by [Jam](/characters/jam/).
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a jerboa.

name: Cosmo
quote: If everyone believes it, then it is the truth.

attr.Soul: Has two: one pink (gas, heart-shaped), the other blue (liquid, slimy)

about:
Cosmo was born with two souls, a rare occurance because of shenanigans with two eggs but no twins.

Cosmo has the mind reading superpower thanks to her third eye, but it's so weak that she can only tell whether somebody is lying intentionally -- though she's quite good at that. She can't tell if someone is lying by omission, or tell facts from lies (so if someone genuinely believes in what they're saying, she will think they're telling the truth), but if you're lying and she heard you, she will know.

When she lies herself, her third eye closes. Otherwise, it stays open, even when she's sleeping. (It closes when she washes her face too though, or it's gonna be awkward.)
note:
- Left eye blue, right eye pink. Left eyebrow pink, right eyebrow blue. Eyelashes match the eyes.
- Sleeves are wider than a normal sleeve.
- Both the inside of her ears and her dress are gradient from pink (top) to blue (bottom).
- Shoes and hairband match color.
- The yellow eye (yellow with black pupil) is always open, unless she's lying.

name: Jam
desc: Teacher of all the subjects because I'm too lazy to make more.
about: Jam is [Sparky](/characters/sparky/)'s teacher at [Coastline Middle School](/world/bauhinia/cms/) and [Jerboa](/characters/jerboa/)'s adoptive father.

name: Trinket
trivia: - She's albino, in case it's not obvious.

name: Nebula
about:
Nebula is the Arch-Magician crowned by the [ISA](/world/westavia/isa/), and the teacher of the [Magic Academy](/world/bauhinia/magic-academy/) appointed by the Bauhinian government.

Her wand of choice is a teaching stick named the Physical Sword, though she did not actually store her magic in it. She just pretends she does and it's not like anyone else would know. She also has myopia, but uses magic to see clearly.

She got strong through *A Guide to Magic*, and cast an irreversible additional charm on it that made her know the book's position at all times, though it came to bite her in the ass: when [Qibli](/characters/qibli/) found out about the book and decided to keep it, she murdered Nebula so she wouldn't know her location all the time.
trivia: - As of now, she's the only character who wears high heels.

name: Fantasy
about: The big sister away at [college](/world/bauhinia/ufc/) and hardly heard from, except when she comes back for holidays. Died under mysterious circumstances, though this time the mystery may *finally* be too dangerous for Sparky to poke her nose in.

name: Ironheart
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be an elephant.

name: Nightsun
about: Nightsun grew up in the hellscape that is Atlasia. He later became a freelance spy, gathering intelligence and selling it to whoever bid the highest — and multiple people, if the risk was low. One day he got someone really pissed off and he fled to Bauhinia, meeting a more-than-friend along the way, who helped him get Bauhinian nationality. But later that boyfriend died and Nightsun shut himself into the closet. He then laid his eyes on Starcorp, and got close enough to Sparky to marry her.
trivia: - Strawberry is his favorite flavor of lolipop.
note: - The highlight on his hair goes up, down, and then up.

name: Bramble
desc: Silly little boy who writes his feelings all over his face.
about: Fantasy's son.

name: Goose
quote: If you feel unloved, we can send you to the Ministry of Love, where you'll be loved *so much* you don't *ever* need to be loved again!
about:
Check out her [PMV](https://youtu.be/v4ats5O0mio)!

Goose is *just* like other girls. She likes everything other girls like. She does everything other girls do. She listens to whatever music is most popular at the moment. She watches whatever show is most popular at the moment.

Goose is just happy to spend her life on the bandwagon.

---

Goose is an officer at the [Ministry of State Security](/world/bauhinia/mss/). She likes juggling her baton and giving vague threats about sending people to a possible Ministry of Love. She has a knack of trying her best at everything she puts her mind to do. She never fails to take business personally.

She 's 29 but still lives with her parents. If they died she would bury herself with them.
trivia:
- She gives off a goofy villain vibe.
- She loves juggling her baton, kicking it from one foot to the other, catching it on her chin, spinning it on her fingertips, and throwing it at random colleagues (usually Pumpkin).
- If she were ever to have a theme song, it would be titled *Goosebumps（鹅皮疙瘩）*.
- If she had a lusus, it would be a goose.
- Song: [苍蝇（The Fly） - ilem](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1p5411879s)
note:
- You can change the uniform design, but
    - Keep it a dark color
    - Have the Bauhinian pink somewhere on it
    - Make sure they're wearing gloves

name: Pumpkin
about: Pumpkin is a goofy guy who loves slurping boba tea and hates filling out forms.
trivia:
- He gives off a goofy dumbass vibe.
- 维吾尔族。
note:
- Any interactions with Goose or other MSS people should be drawn in his uniform.
    - You can change the uniform design, but
        - Keep it a dark color
        - Have the Bauhinian pink somewhere on it
        - Make sure they're wearing gloves
- Any interactions with Candlelight or other villagers should be drawn in his blue clothes.
    - His stubby horn will make a bulge in his hat. Would be charmed if it's drawn, but you don't have to!

name: Halcyon
desc: The only one in the team who actually works.
about:
Halcyon is a [Morelandian](/world/moreland/) spy working for the [MSS](/world/bauhinia/mss/).

An avid opportunist, a hopeless romantic, and a dirty traitor. But did he betray Bauhinia, or did Bauhinia betray *him*?
note:
- You can change the uniform design, but
    - Keep it a dark color
    - Have the Bauhinian pink somewhere on it
    - Make sure they're wearing gloves

name: Paperweight
desc: Grouchy old guy who hates fun.
about:
Paperweight is a senior officer at the [Ministry of State Security](/world/bauhinia/mss/).

He usually maintains a very calm and authoritative composure to others, especially the people he deals with at work — spies, moles, and pesky annoying kids. But under his composure, he is a frothing pit of pure rage. He is constantly angry at everything at once but nothing in particular, saddled by the weight of his own guilt and his colleague's suspicion of treason. To people he knows, like [his](/characters/goose/) [subordinates](/characters/pumpkin/), he yells at them all the time. Also he's homophobic as fuck.

He misses the old times when he could actually run without his knees screaming murder and shoot a gun without his hands shaking. This is why he hates young people — because he's kind of jealous.

He wishes someone could believe him. He wanted [Whiteout](/characters/whiteout/) back.

---

Everyone in this stupid world is an idiot. Including me.

Pumpkin should go fuck his own perverted gay ass! I'd drown him inside a milk tea pool! (Pumpkin: that's a nice way to die actually) Goose can *never* understand human speech. Oh, have the report on my desk by 3, I'd say. She'd flip through the window at 3 in the *fucking morning* and make security piss their pants. Halcyon, would you mind your *own* fucking business? I'm just old; I'm not fucking stupid! You don't have to remind me about that meeting over and over and over — I can keep time better than you could, so shut up!

Sigh. Finally some peace and quiet. Med time. Let me take a blood pressure too… Still a little high. Alright.

Sometimes I wonder if I could just give up and let myself die. What's the point of living like this, isolated by my colleagues, and shunned by my family? Maybe there exists an afterlife, where I could see *them* again… I could tell her that I'm sorry, and that I tried. I never got to ask him whether he was proud of me.

Ugh, Halcyon again. What does that guy want?? He's acting like a mole there with his nose in everyone's businesses. Idiots. All the best people die early. The idiots survive on, alive but not living.
trivia:
- He canonically speaks Cantonese. He's the only character who does, and other characters don't find anything off about it.
    - 他说且只会说粤语。反正大家也听得懂。
- He has a little "my goddamn leash of curses" which is a medicine box, the kind that has cells arranged in three rows (for breakfast, lunch, and dinner) and seven columns (from Monday to Sunday). You put the required amount of pills in each box at the start of every week and take the pills as scheduled. He hates it to the guts.
note:
- You can change the uniform design, but
    - Keep it a dark color
    - Have the Bauhinian pink somewhere on it
    - Make sure they're wearing gloves
- Any interactions with Whiteout should be drawn in his young, yellow-haired design.
- Any interactions with Goose, Pumpkin, and Halcyon should be drawn in his old, bald design.

name: Gecko
quote: Uh... You don't look like Peacock.
about:
我嘞个绝世大冤种啊我的壁虎

Bauhinian smuggler. Had been caught once, but returned to the trade because she didn't know what else to do. Her worst mistake is not knowing that [Peacock](/characters/peacock/) has a [stepdaughter](/characters/sparky/) who is batshit crazy.
trivia: - If she had a lusus, it would be a gecko.

name: Lark
about: A Morelandian agent in Bauhinia, recruited to recover the nuke that the kids found.
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a lark.

name: Pearl
desc: A little girl who cries pearls
about:
She cries pearls. Yes, her tears are literally pearls.

She is everything you would expect a little girl to be: cute, curious, instinctively kind, loves animals, and incredibly stupid.
trivia: - She has both a Bauhinian passport and a Sylvandian one, both totally legal (not forged).

name: Snake
about:
[Jackpot](/character/jackpot/)'s mischevious and ambitious son.

Snake has a mutation that gives him a pair of bird wings.

He is *very* full of himself, but still likes being friends with other people a lot, so he is more pleasant to be around than his dad.

He still lives with his dad because he's too young, but he dreams of leaving him, starting his own business, and living in a big house all on his own.

He has a pet snake named Blizzard. It is — surprise — a Blizzard Cornsnake. He thinks snakes are cool, which is why he also named himself Snake.

name: Snowball
about: Snowball is a part of a nomadic tribe in [Moreland](/world/moreland/)

name: Buttercup
desc: Fleash rebel fighting for independence from Sylvandia.
trivia: - She's probably the character with the longest color palette.

name: Beauty
about:
The oldest daughter in the Cherry-Hyrax family, always neck-deep in pop culture. Her desk is plastered with pictures of her favorite idols.

She has strabismus, where her right eye points outward.

name: Devotion
desc: The boss of everything in existence.

name: Elegance
desc: For fuck's sake the only normal person in the family.

name: Animus
desc: Would be normal too if he weren't a boy which makes him oh-so-special.

attr.Orientation: Homosexual, came out to Sparky only

name: Hyrax
about: Hyrax is the chairman of Starcorp and the father of 5 children — four, actually.

name: Kismet

attr.Soul: Has 6, an original one and 5 superpowered ones, rainbow, all gas

about:
The ~~dictator~~ president of Bauhinia. Extremely powerful.

Kismet was born with nothing special, but he consumed 5 other souls with extremely strong superpowers and now he has all 5 [common powers](/world/superpowers/). He is after [Tundra](/characters/tundra/)'s immortal body. If magic weren't impossible to get ahold of, he would've went for that too.

His 6 souls made him into a rainbow and molded his text color into pure black.

He has his extremely powerful mind-reading tuned to the entire Flower City. Usually people would just be background noise, but he would be alerted if there are in-subservient thoughts.

He is actually the reincarnation of [Hyrax](/characters/hyrax/) with memories intact. Because of this, he came up with the idea (or rather, Hyrax learned that Kismet would do this and Kismet did) of [eternal death](/world/bauhinia/#eternal-death), to prevent people from reincarnating, let alone with memory.

After acquiring Tundra's body, he needed stand-ins for himself in public appearances, and thus [Project Kismet](/stories/project-kismet/) was initiated.
trivia: - His rainbow border comes from too many souls leaking aura. This is purely a design aspect and in-universe characters can't see it.

name: Pinecone
quote: Deep breath… I can do this.
about:
Pinecone used to just be a short little housewife at only 145cm, raising two kids, running a grocery store with her husband, suffering domestic abuse yet trying and failing to seek help. That is, until one day, she was approached by government agents giving her an offer she can't refuse.

Her kids would be guaranteed spots at Bauhinia's top institutions and offered comfortable and well-paid jobs, but Pinecone herself would also be working a secret job that forbids her from seeing her children in person again. She will be trained adequately in her new job. They have been watching her for quite a while and they know she can do it.

Pinecone had to agree. She was then taken to a plastic surgeon, hairdresser, and all that; and by the time she got out she looked no longer like herself, but rather like… the president of Bauhinia, Kismet. She even had a throat implant that changed her voice to his.

That was the job. She would stand in for him during public appearances. Otherwise, she had all the time to herself, though she could not leave the government building nor contact anyone outside, except for calling her kids each once a week, and she had to strictly not mention her job to them. Her younger child, Firecrackers, couldn't even be called at all because he's mute so even if she did call him, he couldn't say anything over the phone. She just left voice messages.

Pinecone is grateful. She is living in a fancy palace and has delicious and nutritious meals every day. Though, sometimes the fear of fucking up and causing an international scandal got too great and she was scared of facing the numerous cameras and journalists. But then, Rosemary will always be there to comfort her.

*This is the best job in the world; you're lucky. Other people wouldn't dream of getting it.*

name: Rosemary
about: Rosemary is assigned Pinecone's handler in Project Kismet. She is gentle and caring, and helped Pinecone get through her worst times. She also has a couple college-aged kids.

name: Sundae
about: Sundae is nice.

name: Dragonfly
desc: Some martial arts master in the woods.

attr.Weapon: His fists. A wooden branch if there is one nearby.

about: Dragonfly is a security guard for Starcorp. He trained Sparky in bodyguarding.
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a dragonfly.

name: Groovy
about: Groovy is Nightsun's case officer.

name: Koala
desc: Jerboa's mother, lead scientist of Project Boomerang.

name: Kangaroo
desc: Jerboa's father, co-lead scientist of Project Boomerang.

name: Robin
about: Took over as lead scientist of Project Boomerang after the disappearance of Koala and Kangaroo.
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a robin.

name: Frosting
about:
Frosting grew up in the Project Boomerang laboratory with her parents.

She grew up to be a government archivist, tasked with erasing records of disappeared people in addition to whatever archivists usually do. She also manages the soul vault.

She let Jerboa into the archives to read about Project Boomerang and his parents.

name: Candlelight
trivia: - 回族。

name: Sunflower
about: Sunflower is a high school student put on "suicide watch" by the [SPF](/world/westavia/spf/) because she had a paracosm called [Tadlet Kingdom](/world/tadlet-kingdom/).

name: Helsinki
about: Helsinki is a distant relative of [Pumpkin](/characters/pumpkin/)'s, descended from the part of his family that didn't immigrate to [Bauhinia](/world/bauhinia/). She lives in [the village](/world/westavia/pumpkins-village/).
trivia: - 维吾尔族。

name: Mooncake
about: A policeman in a [little village](/world/westavia/pumpkins-village/).
trivia: - 东乡族。

name: Thyme
desc: Leader of a tiny nameless village on the outskirts of Area 29
about: The well-revered leader of the nameless village, who once attempted to save it from terrorists. His right leg is crippled from that incident. He is the only one who knows the real name of the village, having been informed of it by the previous leader, though he dares not utter it in front of others.
trivia: - 东乡族。

name: Natasha
about:
Natasha is loud. You'll hear her before you see her. And after you see her, you'll probably feel her. Or feel whatever thing she managed to throw at you.

She seems addicted to attention. She couldn't handle not being in the spotlight. She probably doesn't realize she's not the only person in the world. But she does; she knows that all too clearly. She's like this for a reason. She barely sees her parents, as they're both working in the city. Her grandparents weren't the most fun people in the world by young people standards, and she didn't have any siblings. She was lonely, and she craved attention.
trivia: - 俄罗斯族。

name: Cobalt
about:
Cobalt is as cishet as a cishet could ever cishet. She's so cishet that when she got into [Ironheart](/characters/ironheart/)'s body, she divorced his wife and attempted to get gender-affirming surgery, the latter of which [Sparky](/characters/sparky/) successfully stopped because Ironheart is also as cishet as a cishet could ever cishet and Sparky didn't want him coming back into a woman's body.

She is also a soul-dealer well-trained in the art of soul extraction.

name: Kaleidoscope
about: Kaleidoscope greatly cares for his friends and family, to the point where he even went into the mafia to pay back his father's debt. Ironically, the kidnapping scene he faked in the hopes that his friends would give up on him thinking he's dead actually led them into the underground as well to look for him.

name: Moonbeam
about: Moonbeam is a Sylvandian psychic well-trained in soul-extraction.

name: Starry
about: Went into a coma after getting hit in the head. Since then, [Ribbon](/characters/ribbon/) had kept him alive.

name: Melody
trivia: - His bio is a code.

name: Tundra
trivia: - If he had a lusus, it would be a sloth.

name: Jackalope

attr.Nickname: Jack; Alpha (code name by the MSS)
attr.Soul: Solid, a tangle of barbed wire

about: Jackalope is an officer at the Intelligence Corps of the Guardian Moose.

name: Whiteout
about: Whiteout is a stern MSS officer, but under her hard cover, she harbors great love for her colleagues and apprentice.
note:
- You can change the uniform design, but
    - Keep it a dark color
    - Have the Bauhinian pink somewhere on it
    - Make sure they're wearing gloves

name: Entity

attr.Soul: Solid, soft and squishy like a marshmallow

about:
Entity is an executioner.

Not really though. He's a soul-extractor.

He takes the souls of those sentenced to eternal death — not even allowed to reincarnate. He extracts them, locks them up in a jar, and sends the freshly-drained body to cremation. It's also the reason why he met Frosting, the archivist who handles the soul jars.

At work, he pulls up a stoic and serious face to hide his emotions. To his friends and family, though, he's a scaredy-cat. He screams at the tiniest of bugs and have to have Frosting deal with them. He jumps at the slightest sound.

He believes whole-heartedly that the government has a chip in his brain to monitor his thoughts.

---

People will tell you that bodies without souls are just corpses. I know it's false. They are very much alive. They can live on for around a week. And guess what? For the first few days, the soul — if it had not found a new body — can still feel the old body. I found out during my soul-extraction training, when my friend and I pulled each other's soul out in turn for fun. Which means, the condemned can feel their body being burned to ashes.

I try to live with the knowledge. That they will suffer the fire, that *I* enabled it, and that most of the time, their crimes aren't serious enough to warrant permanent death where even reincarnation, birthing as an *entirely new* soul, is not allowed. *Nothing* warrants that—

Stop thinking! *Stop thinking*, you stupid brain! Don't think — no, not the chip, don't think about it — Of course the government has their reasons! Some people *are* evil enough that there's no place in the world for them. Who am I to disagree? Right. Just do your job. Stop thinking about that. Think about your wife and daughter.

I take a deep breath, and I stop thinking.
trivia: - Song: [Little Pistols by Mother Mother](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6f9Wc1yFsQ)

name: Harmony

attr.Soul: Gas, shaped like a music note

about: Harmony attends the [MSS](/world/bauhinia/mss/)'s spy school in Flower City.

name: Jelly
about:
Jelly is in Bauhinia because of her father's work, while her mother remained back in Westavia. She didn't have friends at school, and was very lonely.

Until one day, two lovely girls came up to her and asked to play with her.

They became BFFs.

name: Checkers

attr.Occupation: Intelligence officer as a cultural attaché

about: Checkers is the (former) cultural attaché of the Westavian Embassy in Flower City. He was then blown and deported.

name: Jasmine
desc: Poet, writer, and a free soul.

attr.Age estimation: At least 10 years older than Frosting that's not that big of a gap is it I mean her physical body is fucking gone already but her poems live forever you know what I mean?

about: A poet from Bauhinia, traveled to Moreland and wandered with the [Appaloosa Tribe](/world/moreland/appaloosa-tribe/) for a long while before being kidnapped back into Bauhinia and sentenced to eternal death.

name: Jinx
about:
Jinx's mother died giving birth. Her father named her "Jinx" because of this.

Jinx made the most athiest of Moose question their beliefs — wherever she went, trouble followed.

After graduating high school, she git drafted into the cavalry for her love of horses, both normal ones and [winghorses](/world/creatures/). After completing her service, she continued to work as a horse trainer and riding instructor.
trivia: - 蒙古族。

name: Typhoon

attr.Soul: Solid, ice cube that looks like chocolate because it's brown

about:
Typhoon used to live on the Fantoni Plateau. But when her parents wanted to force her into an arranged marriage with a boy she hated, she packed a bit of food and water and ran away from home. She went all the way from Fanton to Moreland, all by herself, only hitching maybe a couple rides or three along the way.

A little inside Moreland's borders, she got attacked by a bear and one leg was gravely injured, and started to infect without treatment. That was when the Guardian Moose found her. They sent her to a hospital and had her bad leg amputated, and thus her life was spared. The Guardians then offered to recruit her as their wilderness survival instructor, to which she agreed. She was given Moose nationality.

She was soon hailed as a devil by the new recruits for her strictness and the intensity of her training. Years later, they also got her a prosthetic leg, which made the newbies even more scared because now she can kick them properly. Jinx remembers her torment and thanked the stars that Typhoon didn't have the robot leg while she was in the army.
trivia: - 藏族。

name: Jumbo
about:
Jumbo was just a small trader living near the Fantoni border, trading stuff between Bauhinia and Fanton, mostly staying within the bounds of the law. She loved making OCs based around real-life places in the world too.

When the war broke out, trade between the two nations were nearly all cut off, and Jumbo found herself without any source of income. But the connections she established with Fantoni traders weren't going anywhere. She tried to offer to work for the MSS, but got rejected. And then she suddenly got a tiny bit of actual Bauhinian intel (details TBD), so she tried her luck again with the Fantoni, using that intel as a buy-in. They recruited her.

Jumbo then realized that she had no way of actually gathering useful intel, so she simply made shit up. When inconsistencies were found out by the National Security Agency of Fanton, she made up fake contacts based on her OCs to shift the blame to.

Slowly, due to shit tradecraft, her messages to the Fanton military got intercepted by the MSS. They had a good laugh about how stupid this was, and realized that the NSA trusted Jumbo a lot. Here comes the chance. Sky went to Jumbo and gave her a choice. She can either go to jail for treason, or she can start working for the MSS, giving the NSA some specific fake intel provided to her. The choice was obvious. Jumbo finally got to work for the MSS now.

After the war was over, Jumbo was in a comfortable position. Her salary from the NSA got her through the high wartime utility prices, and she saved up most of her MSS salary, plus they still gave her a monthly pension. She stopped hopping borders constantly, only doing some occasional freelancing, and focused on making her OCs. She planned to publish a novel about them, and had been writing Chapter 1 over and over again for years.

name: Mulberry
about:
Mulberry was a rebellious young college drop-out who longed for the illicit substances banned by her home country. When she was not working at the grocery store, she spent her time on the streets, finding places to buy smokes and drinks.

When the war broke out, she was drafted by the army, but offered to spy on Bauhinia for the NSA to avoid actually getting on the battlefield. Nearly as soon as she landed inside the country she turned herself in to the MSS. Sky got her to send fake intel to the NSA. She stayed in Bauhinia after the war, still working minimum-wage jobs, but getting a pension from the MSS and getting high a lot more safely. (Safe as in the law won't get her; it's still very unhealthy. Don't do drugs.)

name: Blackjack
about:
Blackjack was a Fantoni underground mobster before the war, running her own team of gangsters. She also had some "friends" in the government who would cover for her in exchange for bribes.

Her business should've been booming because of the war, but one of her government pals asked her for a bigger protection fee — run a little spying job in Bauhinia.

Thinking her underground dealing skills amounted to tradecraft, Blackjack landed in Bauhinia, only to be soon caught by the MSS. Sky came in and gave her an offer: execution, or working for the MSS.

Blackjack chose the latter. She was sent back to Fanton with some fake intel intended to fool the government official who asked for it. She would then go do some sabotage stuff ig

After the war had ended, Blackjack was in danger of being found out. Sky staged a rescue mission to smuggle her into Bauhinia, where she lived on as a martial arts instructor.
